Text: no sound on this one and not worth downloding

This thing is terrible. It's footage from their woodstock performance (Navarro, NOT Frusciante) and is overdubbed at the most annoying times by some Brit who doesn't contribute anything useful at all. I wasted 2.8gig on this crap, I wouldn't touch it.

I've downloaded this dvd on a newsgroup,it's terrible no music just talking.
You must be a really hardcore fan if you like this.
Sorry uploader about this negative comment,i appreciate your work and hope to see more uploads from you in the future.
